Package net.usikkert.kouinject

Contains the classes and interfaces making up the IoC container.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BeanDataHandler Interface for getting meta-data from beans.
BeanLoader Interface for the main IoC component, the component that loads beans and autowires the dependencies.
BeanLocator Interface for finding beans.
ClassLocator Interface for finding classes.
CollectionProvider<T> Provides a collection of instances of T.
Injector Public interface for the KouInject injector, giving access to the available beans.
 

Class Summary
AnnotationBasedBeanDataHandler Implementation of BeanDataHandler that uses annotations and reflection to extract meta-data from beans to find dependencies.
AnnotationBasedBeanLocator Implementation of BeanLocator using the Component annotation to detect beans.
AnnotationBasedQualifierHandler Class for finding the qualifier of a class/field/parameter.
AnnotationBasedScopeHandler Class for finding the scope of beans and factory methods.
BeanDataMap Map with bean-data for all the beans possible to create.
BeansInCreation Class for keeping control of beans while they are being created.
ClassPathScanner Finds classes by scanning the classpath.
CreatedBean Represents wrapper for a temporary state of a bean created by the bean loader.
DefaultBeanLoader Default implementation of the BeanLoader.
DefaultInjector An Injector using classpath scanning to detect beans, and annotations for setup of beans and the dependency injections.
SingletonMap Map with cached singleton beans.
 

Package net.usikkert.kouinject Description

Contains the classes and interfaces making up the IoC container.

Author:
Christian Ihle
